Assane Kouyaté (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Mali.
A mụrụ Assane Kouyaté na Bamako n'afọ 1954

N'afọ 1976, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na nka na Ecole Normale Supérieure nke Bamako, wee gaa ụlọakwụkwọ Moscow Institute of Cinema and Television, ebe ọ nwetara diplọma ya nke ọmụmụ ihe nkiri na 1989.
N'afọ 1988, ya na onye nduzi Russia Sergei Salaviov rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka na ihe nkiri Pigeon
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị nduzi n'ụwa niile rụkọtara ọrụ, dị ka onye Argentina Pablo César (Aphrodite, 1998).
N'afọ 2002, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya zuru oke: Kabala, nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere obodo Mandé nke olulu mmiri ya na-ata ata
Kabala meriri ma ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nrite ndị ọka ikpe pụrụ iche na Pan-African Festival of Cinema and Television na Ouagadougou.
